## Block.setAndValidate() method

setAndValidate field value as if changed by a user (fire all events)

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAndValidate(field: string, value: any): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field to set and validate. |
|  value | any | The new value to set for the field. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise that resolves to a boolean indicating the success of the operation.
